FuncDef: This command lists ESM hosts that have an active firewall. Configuring the optional parameters will narrow the scope of the list.
CLIs: firewall-hosts [ subscriber <sub-ident> ] [ ip <ipv6-address/prefix-length> ] [ mac <ieee-address> ] [ firewall-policy <policy-name> ] [ router <router-instance> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC address of a host, in the format xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx.
Specifies the IPv6 prefix of a host. Values-ipv6-address - x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces).
Specifies the name of a firewall policy, up to 32 characters.
Specifies the ID of the router that contains the firewall domain. Values-router-name | vprn-svc-id.
Specifies the subscriber identity string, up to 32 characters.
